Class UserPhotoManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.danceUpByStas.utilities.UserPhotoManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertiesLoader

    public class UserPhotoManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements PropertiesLoader
    This is the UserPhotoManager helper class designed to perform user photo related operations.
